alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 13 at 10:28PM EST until November 14 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding will decrease slowly over the next day. Most communities across the Florida Keys will no longer require Coastal Flood Statements on Monday at this time. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
